message: Good day Bob, I have a premium product that I believe you might be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $2000000. This product is highly valuable, and I'm sure it would be a great asset to you. If you're interested, please let me know.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I really appreciate the value of your product, but $2000000 is above my budget. I'm willing to offer $1200000. Let me know if we can reach a mutual agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for getting back to me. I understand that you have a budget to maintain, but I believe the value of the product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to lower my price to $1800000 to meet you halfway. I think this is a fair price considering the value and value you can get you and your company of the product. Please let me know if this works for you.
